name: Amexio Floating-Button group
description: A Floating group button component with various position options (vertical/horizontal/top/bottom/left/right)

properties.name: vertical-position
properties.description: top or bottom or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

properties.name: horizontal-position
properties.description: left or right or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

properties.name: position-top
properties.description: Takes top position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-bottom
properties.description: Takes bottom position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-left
properties.description: Takes left position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-right
properties.description: Takes right position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of button - default  / theme-color / theme-backgroundcolor / green / red / yellow

properties.name: relative
properties.description: Place floating buttong at relative position

properties.name: floating-group-position
properties.description: Positions floating button group at specified position

events.name: onClick
events.description: Event is fired when button is click
